text: Bihla is a village located in the Ludhiana West tehsil, of Ludhiana district, Punjab.Village is known by Grewal family of Doctors. Late Dr. Mohinder Singh Grewal of the village remained Director Research and Medical education, Punjab and has five generations of doctors family. Now is known for lawyers family ==Administration== The village is administrated by a Sarpanch who is an elected representative of village as per constitution of India and Panchayati raj (India).
